title: Top Methods & Pro's and Con's of Food Preservation
itunes:title: Top Methods & Pro's and Con's of Food Preservation + favorite recipes
description: Learn how to decide which method of home food preservation is best for your crops based on the time and storage you have, pro's and con's of each, and two homesteaders favorite recipes and methods, plus safety tips to make sure the method you're using is the best and safest for your family. For the free recipe and full blog post go to https://melissaknorris.com/149
